snippet: The Agriculture Ministry said it was importing 150,000 tons of corn, the nation’s staple food, from neighboring South Africa to avert a food crisis as millions face starvation.
abstract: Zimbabwe's Agriculture Ministry says it is importing 150,000 tons of corn, nation's staple food, from neighboring South Africa to avert a food crisis as millions face starvation.
lead_paragraph: The Agriculture Ministry said it was importing 150,000 tons of corn, the nation’s staple food, from neighboring South Africa to avert a food crisis as millions face starvation.

headline.main: Zimbabwe: Food Assistance Needed to Stave Off Hunger Crisis, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Zimbabwe: Food Assistance Needed To Stave Off Hunger Crisis, Officials Say
